title: Episode 61: The Disappearance of Bryce Laspisa
description:
Police find a wrecked car just off the highway down a steep embankment. There's blood around, but no driver to be found. Just hours earlier, two worried parents were wondering when their son would be home. And now he is missing - seemingly without a trace. Was this a case of a young man ending his own life or is there something more to the story?
